text: The Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) is a political party in South Africa. Since it was founded it has been led by Mangosuthu Buthelezi. It is currently the fourth largest party in the National Assembly of South Africa. It was very close with the African National Congress. It was founded on 21 March 1975. Category:1975 establishments in Africa Category:20th-century establishments in South Africa Category:Political parties in South Africa
title: Inkatha Freedom Party
